name: TheAtlantic
text: This year’s national reckoning over policing means that more Americans could stand to seriously listen to the music of Drakeo the Ruler and other young rappers who have been incarcerated, Hannah Giorgis writes. https://t.co/a4K4qnylrG

name: TheAtlantic
text: What does "herd immunity" mean? James Hamblin spoke with Howard Forman, a health-policy professor at Yale University who has followed the data on how “herd-immunity strategies” have gone in various countries. Listen on the latest "Social Distance" podcast: https://t.co/EigX4qfIMd https://t.co/j3iASUFw9x
